newsitem.title: USA: Mediware sees Q2 results same as Q1.
newsitem.headline: Mediware sees Q2 results same as Q1.

text.p: Mediware Information Systems Inc said on Wednesday it expected revenue and net profit for the second quarter ending December 31 to be roughly the same as first quarter results.
In the first quarter, the company earned $0.08 per share on net income of $446,000 and revenues of about $4.4 million.
In last year's second quarter, Mediware reported net income of $248,000 on revenue of $2.5 million.
There was no First Call mean earnings estimate for the quarter.
Mediware said demand continued to be strong for its clinical information systems.
The company provides UNIX-based clinical information systems for hospitals.
